name: craigslist_search_housing
description: Search Craigslist housing/apartment listings in a specific city. Returns apartments/rooms with price, location, and details.

steps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('.cl-search-result, .result-row, .cl-static-search-result').forEach((el,i) => { if(i>=15) return; const titleEl = el.querySelector('a.posting-title, a.result-title, a.cl-app-anchor'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('.priceinfo, .result-price'); const meta = el.querySelector('.housing, .meta, .result-meta')?.textContent?.trim()||''; results.push({ title: titleEl?titleEl.textContent.trim():'', url: titleEl?titleEl.href:'', price: priceEl?priceEl.textContent.trim():'', details: meta }); }); return { city: '{{city}}', query: '{{query}}', result_count: results.length, results }
steps.name: page_data
steps.label: Extract data
